summary: In 2100, the newly built Bayside City serves as Japan's premier international port. The Angel Arms Company is established by a former policewoman named Takako, to help wage war on terrorism... See full summary »
cast: Janine Brown|Mari Devon|Bridget Hoffman|Rie Ishizuka|Masako Katsuki|Tomoko Kawakami|Lex Lang|Dave Mallow|Michael McConnohie|Akemi Okamura|Jamieson Price|Peter Spellos|Doug Stone|Karen Strassman|Reiko Takagi|Julie Ann Taylor|Kirk Thornton|Kumiko Watanabe|Dave Wittenberg|Lenore Zann
title: Gundress
